校友資訊交流版（Message Board）
可恩迪股份有限公司徵Merchandiser
＝＝求才事項＝＝
職務名稱：Merchandiser/Associate Merchandiser 工作內容：成衣開發、報價、大貨跟催，與客戶及工廠協調、聯繫
需求條件：
1. Minimum of 3-5 years solid merchandising experience in Knits/Woven apparel under a buying office/trading company, can work independently with US designers and merchants through product development and execution of order placement programs. 2. Good fashion sense and keen understanding of US market trends in Knits/Woven area.
3. Good knowledge fo venders and factories.
4. Good communication skills with strong of English nd Chinese.
歡迎各位有興趣的同學投遞履歷。
應徵方式
聯絡人員：邱小姐13
